title: Flutter 3 brings stable Linux and macOS apps, dynamic themes, Material You, and more
content:
Flutter, Google’s massive cross-platform app development framework, has reached version 3, bringing Material You, Linux, & macOS support, and more.

more…

The post Flutter 3 brings stable Linux and macOS apps, dynamic themes, Material You, and more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Flutter, Google's cross-platform app development framework, has reached version 3, bringing Material You, Linux & macOS support, and more.
